document_data.name: Clan Muzgardt
document_data.mainbody: '''Clan Muzgardt''' was a [[duergar]] clan based in the [[Underdark]] city of [[Gracklstugh]].
document_data.Organization: ''Circa'' [[1489 DR]], the matriarch of the Muzgardt clan was the cunning [[Grandolpha Muzgardt]].
document_data.Activities:
The clan specialized in brewing. Their best draught was [[Darklake Stout]], an [[ale]] made from [[mushroom]]s that only a duergar could truly enjoy. Their [[Darklake Brewery|main brewery]] was located in the [[Gracklstugh/Darklake District|Darklake District]] in Gracklstugh.

Their reach extended far in the Underdark, with their ale being sold in [[Mantol Derith]]―managed by the merchant [[Krimgol Muzgardt]]―and in the [[Sunblight (fortress)|Sunblight]] kingdom beneath the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1490}}, Grandolpha Muzgart was invited to the Sunblight stronghold in [[Icewind Dale]] by [[Xardorok Sunblight]]. She started plotting with his disenfranchised advisors and warriors to overthrow their kings.
